questions.title: What blockchain technology does Gataca use?
questions.response: Gataca is blockchain agnostic and can integrate with any blockchain infrastructure the client chooses.

questions.title: Do you store personal information on the blockchain?
questions.response: No. We do not publish the hash of identity credentials on a blockchain.

questions.title: Does Gataca store information about the userâ€™s identity?
questions.response: No. Gataca embraces privacy-by-design: users store their identity credentials locally in their wallets and they decide who they share them with.

questions.title: Does Gataca use cryptocurrencies?
questions.response: No. Gataca uses cryptography to secure information, just like when you use a digital signature. We chose ED25519 cryptography because of its properties of security, lightness, and performance, particularly on mobile phones.

questions.title: How does Gataca comply with GDPR?
questions.response: Users are in full control of their private information, have revocation capabilities all in one place and technically enforced consent proofs.

questions.title: What happens if a user loses their phone with their ID wallet?
questions.response: We automate an ongoing back-up process for our users. If they lose their phone, they just need to reinstall the application, using their private key and recovery code.
